GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v4.9.318
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: disallow non-stateful expression in sets earlier

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.318 by commit 94e9b75919619ba8c4072abc4917011a7a888a79, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit 0b2d8a7b638b5034d2d68f6add8af94daaa1d4cd. For more details please see the references link.
